channel.title: X-Ray
channel.description:
THIS IS NOT A REPORT!
We need to do something about X-Ray. Place rules against it or something? Or at least ENFORCE the rules behind it? I just had my house raided, the chests could not have been found without the use of X-Ray. How do I know this? Look at my picture:
(please note that there were dirt blocks on top of each and every piece of chest)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zz2Rl.png[/img] The red squares represent blocks that were broken to get into the chests The green squares represent blocks that were NOT destroyed in the process.
As you can see, the X-Rayer ONLY destroyed the blocks on top of the chests. None around it.
So now what? I'm fucking out of 3 full chests of shit, because of something that is against the rules. Will I get my stuff back? Probably not.... What the hell are we supposed to do about X-Rayers? This is just bullshit. We need to do something.
If a mod wants to actually do something about this: The person who did it was "atteto".

item.title: X-Ray
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

shamcooly:

How’d you get all of that moss without using X- Ray?! O.o

I have 5.5 stacks of moss stone and krack gave me 4 stacks a long time ago which ive since used

Its quite easy to get if you go caving alot like i do

Read full topic

item.title: X-Ray
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Well I know there’s some mods that will show you where ores/items are. Like they will highlight a diamond ore block/chest with, let’s say, a green star. Then you can just use X-Ray to get to that ore/chest. You are right, everything will be ok with the residential plugin, but unfortunately with me, the plugin has come too late.

Read full topic

item.title: X-Ray
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Unfortunately there’s nothing that can be done to stop xray, because the anti-xray plugins don’t hide chests (they can only hide unexposed ores, and I think this sometimes causes map bugs?). The residence plugin will solve this problem though.

Read full topic
